domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Political Body

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Pandering to senior citizens. People see through you, especially everyone who has lost a job and need health insurance. Seniors still think you suck since you’ve been so ready to let them die of Coronavirus.  What’s the next faux shit move are you going to throw against the wall?
